mapper.select: select product.PRODUCT_NO, product.SELLER_NO, product.PRODUCT_NAME, product.PRODUCT_PRICE, product.PRODUCT_BRAND, product.PRODUCT_STOCK, product.PRODUCT_OPTION, product.PRODUCT_CONTENT, product.PRODUCT_REG_DATE, product.PRODUCT_DEL_DATE, product.PRODUCT_SELL_START_DATE, product.PRODUCT_SELL_END_DATE, product.PRODUCT_AVG_RATE from product, product_category where product.product_no = product_category.product_no and lower(product.PRODUCT_NAME) LIKE lower('%'||#{productName}||'%')
select PRODUCT_NAME from product where lower(PRODUCT_NAME) LIKE lower('%'||#{productName}||'%')
